text: The 2017 Icelandic Athletics Championships () was the 91st edition of the national outdoor track and field championships for Iceland. It was held from 8–9 July at Selfossvöllur in Selfoss. It served as the selection meeting for Iceland at the 2017 World Championships in Athletics. ==Results== ===Men=== {| |- |100 metres |Kolbeinn Höður Gunnarsson || 10.89 |Ari Bragi Kárason || 10.89
